Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[00:31.58]I remember long ago
[00:34.10]When the world and we were young
[00:36.84]And every day moved in slow motion
[00:41.72]Those days are far away
[00:44.13]Lost in a sea of time
[00:46.97]Our dreams are old and there's no knowing
[00:50.94]
[00:51.41]As we chase the falling rainbows
[00:54.44]And dance across the clouds
[00:56.50]Will we ever see the sunrise
[00:59.35]That we've dreamed so much about
[01:01.47]We're growing old
[01:02.85]But much adventure has been had
[01:05.08]We're filled with wonder
[01:13.26]At the worlds we discovered
[01:15.80]
[01:46.08]I remember all our plans
[01:48.60]And the crazy hopes we had
[01:51.28]But through the years we've grown more sober
[01:58.30]
[01:59.32]We're happy for the times and the moments we've had
[02:04.14]You gotta feel alive before life is over
[02:08.74]Maybe we never arrived
[02:11.12]But we found joy in the journey
[02:13.64]We ran on the narrow path
[02:16.29]And we discovered worlds afar
[02:18.74]As we chase the falling rainbows
[02:23.69]And dance across the clouds
[02:25.60]Will we ever see the sunrise
[02:28.74]That we've dreamed so much about
[02:30.94]We're growing old
[02:32.24]But much adventure has been had
[02:34.56]We're filled with wonder ooh
[02:39.56]At the worlds we discovered
[02:42.19]
[03:35.12]
